duties_responsibilities.duty: Create a consultative partnership with the business owner to define, plan, and execute on deliverables throughout the project life cycle to meet agreed acceptance criteria.
Lead projects of high complexity and may lead multiple projects concurrently in accordance with industry best practices.
Manage projects with enterprise-level impacts involving multiple vendors, delivery partners, and business areas.
Use both Agile and Waterfall delivery methods.
Lead change at the project or program level.
Expertise in Delivery Implementation, Financial, Stakeholder, Vendor & Resource Management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and five years project management or equivalent experience to include enterprise-wide and multiple concurrent projects of increasing complexity.
Project Management Institute (PMI) certification or Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
